## rseq variable

Similar to [aseq](./seq.aseq.md)<!-- -->, returns a zero-copy [ISeq](./api.iseq.md) for the given array, though in reverse order and optionally for defined index range only.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rseq: <T>(buf: Nullable<ArrayLike<T>>, start?: number | undefined, end?: number) => ISeq<T> | undefined
```

## Remarks

If given, `start` MUST be &gt; `end`<!-- -->. The latter defaults to beginning of the array (-1). Also see [arrayIterator()](./arrays.arrayiterator.md) for related functionality.
